metadata.title: CVE-2024-32040 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: FreeRDP is a free implementation of the Remote Desktop Protocol. FreeRDPbased clients that use a version of FreeRDP prior to 3.5.0 or 2.11.6 andhave connections to servers using the `NSC` codec are vulnerable to integerunderflow. Versions 3.5.0 and 2.11.6 patch the issue. As a workaround, donot use the NSC codec (e.g. use `-nsc`).

criterions.comment: freerdp package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
